name: Metal Junk Fighter
description:
Suit up and prepare yourself to defend the Earth's pride against otherwordly beings in the Xeno Tournament held on planet XT-442.

With your mech ready, you travel towards this planet where the tournament is held. Everything on your way goes smoothly, right before the landing. You crash land onto the UAS (Universal Arena Stadium) and your mech breaks down.

You will have to choose which parts of your mech to repair and ready up, in order to defeat your foes in this tournament.

Controls:
Move  -> WASD
Attack  ->  Left Mouse Button
Change Weapon -> Right Mouse Button
Dash -> Space or Shift  (after choosing it)
